text: this is Deanna she comes from a small
Filipino town called Pallonji she was
raised Catholic and her native language
is Bakunin and this is true he's from a
big American city called Phoenix he was
raised Jewish and his first language is
English on paper we have nothing in
common but the universe conspired us to
meet at a Travel event in Asia almost
four years ago and the rest was history
despite coming from different ends of
the world we can easily adapt to each
other's cultures I often visit her
family in the Philippines and she comes
to the US twice a year and in between
we've been to nearly 50 countries and
all seven continents together but
traveling with each other is not always
easy my passport lets me visit 166
countries without a visa
whereas Deana can only visit 63 for our
upcoming euro trip she needed to submit
a hundred and fifty pages to secure her
Schengen visa back when we met I was a
travel blogger and snapchatter
and Deana was working at an office job
at a global company nowadays I make
daily travel videos and she does digital
marketing online and we both work
remotely from any location with a Wi-Fi
signal so how do we sustain this
lifestyle constantly on the road the
short answer is that we work a lot while
Instagram makes it look like we're
always having fun
we're actually behind our computer
screens about 70% of each day sometimes
even a hundred percent
we live and die by Wi-Fi availability
whipping out our laptops in airports
hotels taxis coffee shops and using our
phones to catch up on work in between on
average we clock in 12 to 15 hours of
work a day every single day of the year
to be honest our lives are crazy and I
don't know how we do it but we always
find a way to make it work yes we do
like any couple we argue about the
little things especially since we are
together 24/7 but we always find a way
to compromise she lets me play golf and
plan all my crazy trips Jana's first
time driving over here well I let her go
shopping for makeup and watch her crime
shows
we never get caught up in finances
sometimes I pay sometimes she pays
because it all equals out in the end we
don't even think of ourselves in an
interracial relationship because our
love looks beyond race color and
religion the bottom line is that we
support each other to make our dreams
come true and that's the most important
part to this relationship so to wrap
things up Deanna and I work very hard
for the life that we live but is it
worth it definitely okay I'll cut it
before the - okay we're done with the
talking okay Michael you do this
[Music]
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
